ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Very Bad News Regarding Chains
ygData.msgSnippet: There actually was a second and he took lament like a champ.  Both were yellow to me at 38 so comfortably above the 28(it was 28 right) charm cap.  That was my
ygData.messageBody:
There actually was a second and he took lament like a champ. Both were
yellow to me at 38 so comfortably above the 28(it was 28 right) charm
cap. That was my original plan too, head that way and charm giants,
let them beat the smack out of eachother and soak up xp. Unfortunately
the ones there con'd higher and after a guild event I decided to give
up on leveling for the moment and try to get a Shrunken Gobskull
earring and a Berserker Club. My new project.. *sigh*

Ninev Rudeflute
38 3/5 and annoyed at the 55 min spawn time in parts of Kurn's tower
E'ci

--- Jeffrey Sue <jsue@...> wrote:
> At 02:14 PM 8/23/00 -0700, Ioshua wrote:
> >At least they came out and said it and we can stop dwelling on it,
> all
> >give them the finger in unison and get on with our days.
> >
> >/sigh
> >
> >/rude
> >
> >/kill some more stuff
> >
> >Ninev Rudeflute
> >3850% of first level and taking 10 minutes to solo a Mt Giant Steep.
> >E'ci
>
> you know, if you could find a second mt. giant steep you could have
> them both
> dead in 5 minutes.
>
